## Professional Profile
With nine years of experience in data management, data analysis, and data pipeline development, I specialize in supporting international development, market research, and public health initiatives. My focus areas include communicable and non-communicable diseases, leveraging my expertise in programming and research contexts.

I have extensive experience in database management (e.g., MySQL), electronic data capture (EDC) tools, and advanced data processing using R, SAS, SPSS, and STATA. My skills also include creating dynamic visualizations through tools like RShiny, Power BI, and Tableau. I excel in statistical modeling, scientific publishing, and maintaining strict adherence to data privacy standards, including GDPR compliance.

Additionally, I am skilled in developing documentation, implementation guides, and training modules to ensure the efficient use of data systems and tools.
